entities.name: hungarian horntail
entities.description: The Hungarian Horntail is mentioned as a dragon that participates in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters and students participating in the Triwizard Tournament. He has not mastered Summoning Charms yet.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who insists that learning theory would help Harry master Summoning Charms.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is a duellist and one of the participants in the Triwizard Tournament. He spends a lot of time in the library.

entities.name: wronski feint
entities.description: The Wronski Feint is mentioned as a duelling technique that Viktor Krum uses.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are friends who spend their lunchtimes studying together.
Viktor Krum is a rival of Harry's in the Triwizard Tournament.
Hermione dislikes Viktor Krum because she thinks girls only like him because he's famous.
Harry knows the Wronski Feint is a duelling technique used by Viktor Krum.
